Workflow.Name: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v3 (Orphaned Makers)
Workflow.Description: This flow checks the status of all entries in the Maker table and updates them based on, for example, if they are deleted or disabled. If maker is found to be orphaned, any resources created by the maker (apps, cloud and desktop flows, environments, chatbots) are marked as orphaned.

LocalizedName.description: CLEANUP - Admin | Sync Template v3 (Orphaned Makers)

Description.description: This flow checks the status of all entries in the Maker table and updates them based on, for example, if they are deleted or disabled. If maker is found to be orphaned, any resources created by the maker (apps, cloud and desktop flows, environments, chatbots) are marked as orphaned.
